data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 13185, Version Hash: 7a6009ff7fb1d1c9d86a43a0e1829d40a3722b55
data.actual_result: The Someone Mention appears as if it is a valid Mention, but does NOT Mention anyone or show the Rainbow
data.expected_result: There should be no trace of a Mention because the Someone Mention has been Disabled and there is no User called Someone
data.short_description: It's possible to do a Someone Mention even though the Someone Mention is Disabled and there is no User with that name
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new Server - Access a Text Channel - Send any message that includes the Someone Mention
